name: Mail
body:
Templates and archive for [Postmaster](https://postmaster.rime.co)

## `upload` folder is used to store attachments for drafting purpose only
Example:
- http://pages.rime.co/mails/sample.html
- http://pages.rime.co/mails/Test.html
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
